CVM() - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc.example.CVM
 
CVMDebugModes - Enum in fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers
The enumeration CVMDebugModes defines the different debug modes that can be set on a BCM virtual machine to trigger traces on the corresponding processes in the execution of a program (publishing ports, calling methods across ports and connectors, etc.).
CVMDebugModes() - Constructor for enum fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers.CVMDebugModes
 
CVMDebugModesI - Interface in fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers
The interface CVMDebugModesI marks values of debug modes to ease their extension by end users.
CVMState - Enum in fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm
The class CVMState describes the different states in which a component virtual machine can be during its life-cycle.
CVMState() - Constructor for enum fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.CVMState
 
CVMStateI - Interface in fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm
The interface CVMStateI represents the common supertype of all states in component virtual machines life-cycles.
